meanings.definition: The process of assigning a code to something for classification or identification.
meanings.sent1: I learned about coding in my science class.
meanings.sent2: She was responsible for the coding of the new products.
meanings.sent3: The coding on the products made them easy to organize.
meanings.sent4: His coding system for the books was like a secret language.
meanings.sent5: The coding on the packages helped the workers know where to place them.

meanings.definition: The act of programming a computer or software.
meanings.sent1: Coding can be challenging but rewarding.
meanings.sent2: He spends hours each day doing coding for his job.
meanings.sent3: The coding errors in the program made it act funny.
meanings.sent4: Her coding skills were like magic to her friends.
meanings.sent5: The coding of the game was so well done that it felt real.
